node.name: Telnet/VTY Configuration Node
node.description: Configure parameters of the Telnet/VTY Interface, such as to which IP address it should bind/listen to.

node.name: CTRL Configuration Node
node.description: Configure parameters of the CTRL Interface, such as to which IP address it should bind/listen to.

node.name: GGSN Instance Configuration Node
node.description: Configure an Instance of a (virtual) GGSN

node.name: APN Configuration Node
node.description: Configure an Access Point Name (APN) inside a GGSN Instance
